title: Check out these freshly picked Steam Deck Verified games
description: January is almost, finally, over so here's some freshly picked and washed Steam Deck Verified games that might help you push through February.

title: Godot Engine 4.3 will have official Wayland support
description: 2024 is clearly the year of Wayland on the desktop, and now Godot Engine will have official Wayland support with an upcoming new release.

title: Celeste gets a 3D makeover in Celeste 64 for the sixth anniversary
description: Celeste is easily one of the most popular indie platformers ever made, and it's still going strong six years later. To celebrate, the developers put up a 3D version with Celeste 64: Fragments of the Mountain.

title: GE-Proton 8-29 and GE-Proton 8-30 released with EAC fix and TEKKEN 8 fix
description: As usual for a new release of GE-Proton, GE-Proton 8-28 came with some issues, and so some hotfixes are available bringing it up to GE-Proton version 8-30.

title: Age of Empires IV gets a fix for Steam Deck / Linux online play desyncs
description: Age of Empires IV just got a fresh 2024 patch and excitingly, it gets an official fix for Steam Deck / Desktop Linux multiplayer problems.

title: Qualys discovers glibc flaw that could enable attackers to gain full root access
description: Well, here's another remind to keep your PC up to date. Despite Linux being know for security, it's not perfect (no software is) and researchers at Qualys discovered multiple vulnerabilities in the GNU C Library.

title: What to Expect From Wine on Wayland in 2024
description: Collabora, the company responsible for developing Wine's Wayland driver and getting it into Wine proper, has just published Wine on Wayland: A year in review (and a look ahead).
